パッケージ org.interledger

The main package for top-level Interledger objects.

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースのサマリー 
    インタフェース 説明
    InterledgerAddress
    Interledger Protocol (ILP) Addresses identify Ledger accounts (or groups of Ledger accounts) in an ILP network, and provide a way to route a payment to its intended destination.
    InterledgerPacket
    A top-level interface for all Interledger objects that can be encoded and decoded as an Interledger packet using some sort of encoding, such as ANS.1, JSON, Protobuf or some other encoding.
    InterledgerPacket.Handler<R>
    A handler interface that defines all types of InterledgerPacket to handle.
    InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler
    A handler interface that defines all types of InterledgerPacket to handle.
  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    InterledgerAddress.AbstractInterledgerAddress  
    InterledgerAddressBuilder
    Builds instances of type AbstractInterledgerAddress.
    InterledgerPacket.Handler.AbstractHandler<R>
    A handler for allowing callers to specify logic based upon an unknown result type.
    InterledgerPacket.Handler.AbstractHandler.HelperHandler<R>
    A utility class that provides default implementations of InterledgerPacket.Handler.AbstractHandler so that a caller is only forced to implement the handlers that are of interest.
    InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler.AbstractVoidHandler
    An abstract implementation of InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler for allowing callers to specify logic based upon an unknown result type extending InterledgerPacket.
    InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler.AbstractVoidHandler.HelperHandler
    A utility class that provides default implementations of InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler.AbstractVoidHandler methods so that a caller is only forced to implement the handlers that are of interest.
  • 例外のサマリー 
    例外 説明
    InterledgerProtocolException
    Base ILP exception, see RFC REF: https://interledger.org/rfcs/0003-interledger-protocol/#errors
    InterledgerRuntimeException  

パッケージorg.interledgerの説明

The main package for top-level Interledger objects.
